column5: Hi all,  feels like its been a while since i went fishing.....lol....in my world almost 2 weeks is a long time!  Got out yesterday with my buddy Scott....       GOT INTO SOME LING (depite what i say in the video we did keep it.), WHITEFISH AND LAKE TROUT AT THE FIRST LAKE.                                              WE GOT PACKED UP BY NOON AND HIT THE TRAIL TO ANOTHER LAKE FOR SOME WALLEYE         SAW THIS GUY EATING A HARE ON THE WAY IN              SET UP AT THE NEXT LAKE AND APART FROM A COUPLE PIKE AND SMALL WALLEYE WE HAD TO WAIT AND JUST SQUEEZED IN A LIMIT BEFORE DARK                           VIDEO      Tight lines all!

Man thats a cool report, bonus seeing the Lynx or whatever that kitty was, thats pretty cool. I've never caught a Ling before, but thats some crazy looking fish right there. Thanks for sharing that one, looked like an awsome day.
Congrats to you Simon. That is a LARGE ling! Seldom see them that big here. You lead a charmed life my friend.
x2 - anywhere you can count on a limit out as a rule is stellar.
Nice job Simon. Ling must grow big up that way. I remember catching a few on Sturgeon (north of Ignace) with heads on them the size of 10 pin bowling balls!
When I first looked at your helmet on your sled I thought it was a kid on a 120cc. Nice outing. I guess I could do 2 lakes in one day but that seems like a lot of work.
Your realy starting to get on my nerves. Good for you Limey glad to see you had another good DAY
Good fishing Simon.  Those 2 lakes make for a great multi-species day!  I've yet to get a nice Ling this year, but I know there are some monsters down there.
Awesome, Simon!!!!!  Love the lynx shot!!
What a great day for you guys out there!!!  What do you think of the Otter hut?  Paul is very happy with his!
great Lynx shots and awesome fishing.
Great fishing Simon... and yes, quite a thing that ling.  Love the lynx encounter... been a looooong time it seems since last seeing one.
awesome multi species report for sure !!! wow thats a huge ling too,and love the shots of the lynx....nice country up there for sure simon...cheers
Wow that's a fantastic day fishing! That's a cool animal shot you got there! Ever do any hunting up there?
Got to love it, hitting 2 lakes and get into multi species Great job Simon   Looks like fun times Thanks for sharing TJunkie
Great report and I would say You have a good life up there. Thanks Mike
Ding-a-ling!  You whacked 'em good!
That's quite the day! good job Simon
what a fun day that must have been!  great report  cheers!
Great report. Thanks for sharing.
